verses.verse: And <S%H310>after<s%> this it came to pass, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> them: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4965>Metheg-ammah<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> them with a <S%H2256>line<s%>, casting them <S%H7901>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; even with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2256>lines<s%> <S%H4058>measured<s%> he to put to <S%H4191>death<s%>, and with one <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> to keep <S%H2421>alive<s%>. And so the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> became <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>gifts<s%>.

¶ <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> also <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>, as he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7725>recover<s%> his <S%H3027>border<s%> at the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> from him a <S%H505>thousand<s%> chariots, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376%H7273>footmen<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6131>houghed<s%> all the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> horses, but <S%H3498>reserved<s%> of them for an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>.

And when the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>succour<s%> <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H758>Syria<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>: and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>gifts<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>preserved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that were on the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
¶ When <S%H8583>Toi<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> all the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%>,

Then <S%H8583>Toi<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3141>Joram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, to <S%H7592%H7965>salute<s%> him, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> him, because he had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%>, and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> him: for <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%> had <S%H376%H4421>wars<s%> with <S%H8583>Toi<s%>. And Joram brought with <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>:

Which also <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> did <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, with the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> that he had <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> which he <S%H3533>subdued<s%>;

Of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>, and of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H1909>Hadadezer<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>gat<s%> him a <S%H8034>name<s%> when he <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H5221>smiting<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%>, being <S%H8083%H6240>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men.

¶ And he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%>; throughout all <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> he <S%H5333>garrisons<s%>, and all they of <S%H123>Edom<s%> became <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>preserved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%> unto all his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> was over the <S%H6635>host<s%>; and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%> was <S%H2142>recorder<s%>;

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>, were the <S%H3548>priests<s%>; and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> was the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>;

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over both the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites<s%>; and <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> were chief <S%H3548>rulers<s%>.
